nodes.text: Star Wars: Complete Locations, also known as Star Wars: Complete Locations — Inside the Worlds of Episode I to VI, is a 176-page reference book released on October 17, 2005 by DK Publishing. Part of the Inside the Worlds of series of Star Wars reference books, Complete Locations is a compilation of the three previous books—Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Attack of the Clones, and Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy—combined with new content covering the 2005 film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.

The galaxy map used in the book treats the borders of the galactic regions as concentric circles, resulting in some erroneous region placements for various planets. The number of moons for a number of planets, including Kashyyyk, is also incorrect.
